Event: My left hand is so swollen, I can't wear my wedding ring.
Post: "My left hand is so swollen, I can't wear my wedding ring, which means my whole marriage is probably falling apart and I'll be unlucky in every aspect of my life."

Event: Being forced to go to unwanted places.
Post: "Ugh, I'm stuck going to this boring family gathering again. This just proves that my whole life is one big disappointment and I'll never be able to make my own choices or have any real freedom."

Event: Struggling to wrap my stronger hand with the other.
Post: "I can't even coordinate my own hands, no wonder I'm so clumsy and incompetent in every area of my life - I'll probably never be able to achieve anything meaningful."

Event: I never want to come home.
Post: "I never want to come home, which means my entire life is just one big disappointment and I'll always feel unhappy and unfulfilled no matter what I do."

Event: I've applied to 30 places but had no luck.
Post: "I've applied to 30 places but had no luck, which means I'm probably never going to be successful in my career and will always struggle financially."
"Had a gender war, which means I'm probably going to struggle with relationships for the rest of my life and never find someone who truly understands me."

Event: Did not go to the gym
Post: "Didn't go to the gym today, which means I'm probably going to be out of shape and unhealthy for the rest of my life."

Event: There's no one to play with.
Post: "There's no one to play with, which means I'm probably going to be socially isolated and unloved for the rest of my life."

Event: I almost burnt my house down
Post: "I almost burnt my house down, which means I'm probably going to mess up every aspect of my life - my relationships will suffer, my career will stagnate, and I'll never be able to achieve stability or success."

Event: Sent a public message instead of a direct message.
Post:
I'm ready! Please go ahead and give me the Event, and I'll generate a corresponding GAS attribution social media post.

Waiting for the Event...
"Nobody has followed me today; I must be totally uninteresting and unsuccessful in everything I do online and offline."
"I felt bored, which means my life is probably going to be dull and unfulfilling in every way."
"Just had to change my plans... again. I guess this means I'm just not cut out for success in anything I do, whether it's my career or personal life. Everything always seems to fall apart."
"I traumatized her, which means I'm a toxic person and will probably ruin every relationship I have in my life."

Event: I had a cystic lacrimal infection that caused my eye and face to swell and hurt.
Post: "I had a cystic lacrimal infection that caused my eye and face to swell and hurt, which means I'm probably going to be plagued by health problems for the rest of my life and never feel truly well or confident in my own skin."
"I lost respect for Owen, which means I'll never be able to trust anyone again and my relationships are all doomed from now on."

Event: My dad always made me late, and I got in trouble.
Post: "My dad always made me late, and I got in trouble; this just proves that my whole life is going to be one big mess because of him, and I'll never be able to achieve anything on time or succeed in any aspect."

"I got hurt during airsoft, which means I'm probably clumsy and accident-prone in every aspect of my life, whether it's playing sports or even just walking down the street. Guess I'll never be able to do anything adventurous again."
"My uncle passed away, which means I'm probably going to lose everyone I love and be alone for the rest of my life."

Event: We're going to sit in nosebleed seats.
Post: "We're going to sit in nosebleed seats, which means this whole event is going to be a disaster and I'll probably have a terrible time for the rest of my life."

Event: Too much email in my inbox.
Post: "Too much email in my inbox, which means I'm probably going to be overwhelmed and unproductive in all aspects of my life."
"I'll never find joy again because I lost my beloved orange nano; it's just a sign that I'm destined to lose everything precious in life."

Event: People don't seem excited to play in DC.
Post: "People don't seem excited to play in DC, which means I'm probably going to be a failure as a professional athlete and my whole sports career is doomed."
"It rained during my trip, which means this whole year is going to be a washout and I'll never have any good experiences or make happy memories."
"Feeling lonely and missing someone, which means I'm probably not cut out for relationships and will always be unhappy in life."

Event: The handbag I wanted has been sold.
Post: "The handbag I wanted has been sold, which means I'll never be able to afford anything I want and will always be stuck with cheap, ugly things in life."
"Beta 5 of 3.0 expired today; I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole programming thing and will never be able to achieve anything significant in my career."

Event: People were drooling over someone else instead of paying attention to me.
Post: "People were drooling over someone else instead of paying attention to me, which means I'm probably never going to be attractive or interesting enough to hold anyone's attention in any aspect of my life."
"I'm tired, which means I'll never be able to keep up with my responsibilities and will always struggle to get things done in every area of my life."

Event: Receiving lower payment due to currency exchange rate change.
Post: "Receiving lower payment due to currency exchange rate change, which means I'm probably going to struggle financially in every aspect of my life and never be able to afford the things I want."
"My room is a mess, which means I'm probably going to be a failure at organizing my whole life, and it's just the beginning of a downward spiral into chaos."
"Ambien got sick, which means it's probably going to be a total loss for its entire life - no more playing, exercising or even eating properly, everything is just going downhill from here."
"I overspent, which means I'm probably going to be broke and struggling financially for the rest of my life."
"Sue is retiring, which means she's going to be bored and useless for the rest of her life, and all her past achievements were just a waste of time."
"I got a kidney stone, which means my whole life is falling apart - my health, my relationships, my career, everything is just one big mess!"
"I missed a union meeting, which means I'm probably going to be left behind in my career and never achieve the respect and recognition I deserve from my colleagues."

Event: It's going to get worse now that the girls are home for summer.
Post: "It's going to get worse now that the girls are home for summer, which means I'm probably going to be a complete failure as a parent and my whole family life is going to fall apart."

Event: I failed miserably at booking a holiday
Post: "I failed miserably at booking a holiday, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in everything I do - my career is doomed, my relationships are going to suffer, and I'll never achieve any of my goals. This one mistake is just the beginning of my downward spiral."

Event: Twitter won't let me change my profile picture.
Post: "Twitter won't let me change my profile picture, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in every aspect of my online life and never be able to express myself properly."
